flawed_nl_solution:
Greg kept 1 granola bar for each of the 7 days of the week, so there were 20 - 7 = <<20-7=11>>11 bars left.
He traded 3 to his friend Pete, so there were 11 - 3 = 8 bars left.
His 2 sisters split the rest evenly, so each got 8 / 2 = <<8/2=4>>4 granola bars.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
